content.html: Then you aren’t paying attention, Bob. They aren’t paying rent. They are refusing to pay the severance they promised. They shut down Twitter Spaces. Verification no longer works in Ukraine. Musk just suspended a number of journalists. You disappoint me, Bob. In every way.
content.value:
Then you aren’t paying attention, Bob.

They aren’t paying rent. They are refusing to pay the severance they promised. They shut down Twitter Spaces. Verification no longer works in Ukraine. Musk just suspended a number of journalists.

You disappoint me, Bob. In every way.
